_comment: CDK Context Configuration for OSCAR Slack Bot
_description: This file contains non-sensitive configuration parameters. Secrets should be in .env file.
_stage_comment: Deployment stage: Dev, Beta, or Prod. Affects resource retention policies.
_model_comment: ARN of the Bedrock foundation model to use for responses
_sessions_table_comment: Name for the DynamoDB table storing session data
_context_table_comment: Name for the DynamoDB table storing conversation context
_lambda_function_comment: Name for the Lambda function (must be unique in AWS account/region)
_dedup_ttl_comment: Time-to-live for deduplication in seconds (5 minutes)
_session_ttl_comment: Time-to-live for sessions in seconds (1 hour)
_context_ttl_comment: Time-to-live for context in seconds (7 days)
_max_context_comment: Maximum length of context to maintain
_cors_comment: Additional CORS origins (comma-separated). Slack origins are included by default.
